name: Phantom Square (OPEN ALPHA)
description:
Somewhere in an unknown world, Phantom wakes up.

He doesn't remember anything, he doesn't know where he is, he only knows that this universe is in a big trouble

(Please use 16:9 resolutions, because without it, it will ruin your experience)

Controls:

Escape - Pause

In-Game:

Space - Jump

A/D - Move

E - Boost

R - Heal

Q/Left Mouse - Attack

Level Editor:

WASD - Move Cursor

Up/Down/Left/Right arrows - Move Camera

E - Pick Up/Put Down Object

R - Delete Object

Q - Edit Object

1/2/3/4/5 - Place an object 

6/7 - Previous/Next Object Bar

Z/X - Size X Up/Down 

C/V - Size Y Up/Down
